0P0000MNKH.L.long_name: Aegon International International Bond Select Ptfl B
0P0000MNKH.L.summary:
This multi-manager portfolio aims to provide a good level of long-term capital growth by investing in a number of high-quality global fixed interest (bonds) funds from different managers, recommended by independent researchers Morningstar OBSR.
The portfolio targets returns above the JPMorgan Global GBI ex Japan Index over rolling three-year periods and Morningstar OBSR help us to select and manage the blend of funds on an ongoing basis to help it achieve this.
